Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Cargo hook release malfunction. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 08/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
